title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 179 - Standards For Resident Behavior
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 179 - Standards For Resident Behavior

State Regulations

Subpart 179-1 - Disciplinary Actions (§ 179-1.1 to 179-1.17 to 179-1.20)

Subpart 179-2 - Good Behavior Allowances (§ 179-2.1 to 179-2.11)

Subpart 179-3 - Temporary Release Programs (§ 179-3.1 to 179-3.14)

Subpart 179-4 - Resident Rules (§ 179-4.1 to 179-4.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 179

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §§
500, 501, 508, 515-b[7]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
